memberdef.name: VTOPERATOR_CPPSCALAR
memberdef.initializer: template<typename T> \ VtArray<T> operator op (T const &scalar, VtArray<T> const &arr) { \ using Op = Vt_ArrayOpHelp<T>; \ VtArray<T> ret(arr.size()); \ std::transform(arr.begin(), arr.end(), ret.begin(), \ [&scalar](T const &aObj) { \ return Op:: opName (scalar, aObj); \ }); \ return ret; \ } \ template<typename T> \ VtArray<T> operator op (VtArray<T> const &arr, T const &scalar) { \ using Op = Vt_ArrayOpHelp<T>; \ VtArray<T> ret(arr.size()); \ std::transform(arr.begin(), arr.end(), ret.begin(), \ [&scalar](T const &aObj) { \ return Op:: opName (aObj, scalar); \ }); \ return ret; \ }

memberdef.name: VTOPERATOR_CPPSCALAR_DOUBLE
memberdef.initializer: template<typename T> \ std::enable_if_t<!std::is_same<T, double>::value, VtArray<T>> \ operator op (double const &scalar, VtArray<T> const &arr) { \ using Op = Vt_ArrayOpHelpScalar<T>; \ VtArray<T> ret(arr.size()); \ std::transform(arr.begin(), arr.end(), ret.begin(), \ [&scalar](T const &aObj) { \ return Op:: opName (scalar, aObj); \ }); \ return ret; \ } \ template<typename T> \ std::enable_if_t<!std::is_same<T, double>::value, VtArray<T>> \ operator op (VtArray<T> const &arr, double const &scalar) { \ using Op = Vt_ArrayOpHelpScalar<T>; \ VtArray<T> ret(arr.size()); \ std::transform(arr.begin(), arr.end(), ret.begin(), \ [&scalar](T const &aObj) { \ return Op:: opName (aObj, scalar); \ }); \ return ret; \ }
